content: Christmas Toy - Embroidery "Bitcoin"Condition: MINT 100%HandMade by 5KsanaLocation: PolandDelivery: International- Free.As the name suggests, this fine embroidery was inspired by Bitcoin!My Christmas toys-embroideries “Bitcoin” are a true poetry of folk art, a message embroidered on «magic» fabric.My embroidery evokes the transmission of knowledge between generations.The fate of the BITCOIN can only be changed by Christmas!So we think about winning and we will go only forward.Materials:-piece of fabric (100% cotton); -sequins;-threads;Quantity: 2 pcs. (selling the set of 2 toys) Dimension:wide – 11 cm; height – 11 cm.
